id.description: Unique identifier for the shipping rate

object.description: Type of object, in this case, it will always be 'shipping_rate'

active.description: Specifies if the shipping rate is currently active or not

created.description: Timestamp indicating when the shipping rate was created

delivery_estimate.description: Estimated delivery time for the shipping rate

display_name.description: Name displayed for the shipping rate

fixed_amount.description: Details about the fixed shipping amount associated with a shipping rate.

amount.description: Fixed amount for the shipping rate

livemode.description: Indicates if the shipping rate is in live mode

metadata.description: Any additional data related to the shipping rate that is not directly represented by other fields.

amount.description: Metadata amount associated with the shipping rate

tax_behavior.description: Specifies tax behavior for the shipping rate

tax_code.description: Tax code related to the shipping rate

type.description: Type of shipping rate, e.g., international, domestic, etc.
